availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph B. Read (Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Lucretia A. Brown Read in Jefferson County, Kentucky, in February 1860. Father of John S. Read and Anthon Read. Resident in Jefferson County in 1860. Household owned four enslaved persons in Jefferson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 7, p. 484.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 7, p. 284B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 9, p.247A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000819612.
"Joseph B. Read (1829-1895)," Find A Grave, Memorial #89620977, accessed November 12, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/89620977.
